plants.name: Berberis Thunbergii
plants.description: Berberis thunbergii, the Japanese barberry, Thunberg's barberry, or red barberry, is a species of flowering plant in the barberry family, Berberidaceae, native to Japan and eastern Asia, though widely naturalized in China and in North America

plants.name: Juniperus Chinensis
plants.description: Juniperus chinensis (Chinese juniper) is a juniper that grows as a shrub or tree with a very variable shape, reaching 1â€“20 m tall. This native of northeast Asia grows in China, Mongolia, Japan, Korea and the southeast of Russia.

plants.name: Ligustrum Obtusifolium Subsp. Suave
plants.description: Ligustrum obtusifolium (border privet or Amur privet) is a species of privet, native to Japan, Korea and northeastern China (Heilongjiang, Jiangsu, Liaoning, Shandong, Zhejiang).

plants.name: Ligustrum Vulgare
plants.description: Ligustrum vulgare (wild privet, also sometimes known as common privet or European privet) is a species of Ligustrum native to central and southern Europe, north Africa and southwestern Asia, from Ireland and southwestern Sweden south to Morocco, and east to Poland and northwestern Iran.

plants.name: Parthenocissus Tricuspidata
plants.description: Parthenocissus tricuspidata is a flowering plant in the grape family (Vitaceae) native to eastern Asia in Japan, Korea, and northern and eastern China.

plants.name: Taxus Cuspidata
plants.description: Taxus cuspidata, the Japanese yew or spreading yew, is a member of the genus Taxus, native to Japan, Korea, northeast China and the extreme southeast of Russia.
